mapper.sql: id, user_id, membership_card_id, `explain`, status, record_id, money, order_no, admin_id, updated, created
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.user_id, a.membership_card_id, a.`explain`, a.money, a.created, c.title, d.nickname, d.phone, e.name as storeName, g.card_no from card_rebate a left join membership_card c on a.membership_card_id = c.id left join app_user d on d.id = a.user_id left join store e on a.admin_id = e.admin_id left join user_member_card g on a.user_id = g.user_id and a.membership_card_id = g.membership_card_id where a.status = 1
and a.admin_id = #{adminId}
and d.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
and e.name like concat('%',#{storeName},'%')
and g.card_no like concat('%',#{cardNo},'%')
and unix_timestamp(a.created) >= #{startTime} and unix_timestamp(a.created) < #{endTime}
order by a.created DESC

select a.id, a.user_id, a.membership_card_id, a.`explain`, a.money, a.created, c.title, d.nickname, d.phone, e.name as storeName, g.card_no from card_rebate a left join membership_card c on a.membership_card_id = c.id left join app_user d on d.id = a.user_id left join store e on a.admin_id = e.admin_id left join user_member_card g on a.user_id = g.user_id and a.membership_card_id = g.membership_card_id where a.status = 1 and a.admin_id in
#{list}
and d.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
and e.name like concat('%',#{storeName},'%')
and g.card_no like concat('%',#{cardNo},'%')
and unix_timestamp(a.created) >= #{startTime} and unix_timestamp(a.created) < #{endTime}
order by a.created DESC
mapper.insert: insert into card_rebate (id, user_id, membership_card_id, `explain`, status, record_id, money, order_no, admin_id, updated, created) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{membershipCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now())

id,
user_id,
membership_card_id,
`explain`,
status,
record_id,
money,
order_no,
admin_id,

mapper.update:
update card_rebate
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
membership_card_id = #{membershipCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
explain = #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update card_rebate set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, membership_card_id = #{membershipCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, explain = #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
